projectInfo: Used JavaScript and D3.js to visualize huge JSON data into graphs, charts, and maps.
projects: Bar Chart to visualize US GDP.
Scatterplot Graph to display Doping in Professional Bicycle Racing.
Choropleth Map to show US Educational Attainment.
TreeMap Diagram to visualize multiple sales data set.

projectInfo: Used only vanilla JavaScript for the purpose. Learnt about Game Mechanics (gravity,bounce,movement) and got a better understading about the JavaScript scopes, objects, closures and events.
Used NodeJS and Express to create a server that handles clients' requests and provide data from the MongoDB database using Mongoose.js.
